RIGHT OUTER JOIN â€‹

  • ä»¥å³é‚Šçš„è¡¨ç‚ºä¸»ï¼Œä¿ç•™å³é‚Šè¡¨çš„æ‰€æœ‰è¨˜éŒ„ï¼Œå³ä½¿æ²’æœ‰åŒ¹é…çš„è¨˜éŒ„ä¹Ÿæœƒé¡¯ç¤º NULLã€‚

3. CROSS JOIN â€‹

  • å…©è¡¨ç›¸äº’æ¯”å°ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ‰€æœ‰æ’åˆ—çµ„åˆçš„è¨˜éŒ„ã€‚

  • ç‰¹é»ï¼š

ç¯„ä¾‹ç¸½çµ â€‹

sql
-- INNER JOIN ç¯„ä¾‹
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Customers.CustomerName
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;

-- LEFT OUTER JOIN ç¯„ä¾‹
SELECT Customers.CustomerName, Orders.OrderID
FROM Customers
LEFT OUTER JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID = Orders.CustomerID;

-- RIGHT OUTER JOIN ç¯„ä¾‹
SELECT Orders.OrderID, Customers.CustomerName
FROM Orders
RIGHT OUTER JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;

-- CROSS JOIN ç¯„ä¾‹
SELECT Employees.EmployeeName, Projects.ProjectName
FROM Employees
CROSS JOIN Projects;
